alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 7:06PM EST until February 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Madison, Cortland and Chenango counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of precipitation is expected to continue through most of tonight, before changing over to rain late tonight or Thursday morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. &&

area.areaDesc: Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Yates
